If you are totally bored and have nothing to do ... visit
http://www.3-hajime.com/cgi-local/bbs_06.cgi
a poster named "passenger" and I are trying to communicate :D
...I hope I represented all of us well with my really really simple
English...gosh I wish they would stop being so shy (note her command
of the English language...some of us are still trying to count in
Japanese LOL!)...I know we have Japanese visitors to shinsengumimb.com
not only because momoiro-usagi read our posts but because have lurkers
at like 2-3am...during the daytime in Japan I think.
